name: st_x
description:
Extracts the `x` coordinate from the supplied point.
If the points is of type `geo_point` this is equivalent to extracting the `longitude` value.

params.name: point
params.description: Expression of type `geo_point` or `cartesian_point`. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: point
params.description: Expression of type `geo_point` or `cartesian_point`. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

examples:
ROW point = TO_GEOPOINT("POINT(42.97109629958868 14.7552534006536)")
| EVAL x =  ST_X(point), y = ST_Y(point)
